div.p: SEPTENTRIO, in aſtronomy, a conſtellation, more uſually called urſa minor.
In coſmography, the term s eptentrio denotes the ſame with north: and hence ſeptentrional is applied to any thing belonging to the north ; as ſeptentrional ſigns, parallels, &c.
